org.orgName: United States District Court For The Western District of Washington Northern Division

div1.p: of Whitman County Washington Territory. The said jail being the one provided by the county commissioners of rain county for the purpose of confining persones convicted of and or accured of crime. That your aff he as the count sheriff of said county is the keeper of said jail, and kept the same in as clean and healthful condition as the circumstances, and strict rules and regulation with permit. That the food provided for the immates of said jail is healthful and wholesome and clean. That the bedding on which they sleep is clean and sufficient; and if said jail is unhealthful, or if the cells then are an unhealthful or unwholesome, it is because of the improper and of said jail or become of the locality in which this same is , which is the failure of your said sheriff, That he has exercised no war restrained upon this Michael Shreck, that was is necessary to prevent his
